Sequence Information.Peptide Name: RR-12Wpolar (Arg-rich; Leu-rich; synthetic AMPs, UCLL1c, XXA)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (91.67%) toRR-12R: 33%; L: 42%: I: 17%. GRAVY: 0.76; M Wt: 1621.1; Mol formula: C77H138N25O13; molar extinction coeff: 5550.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli BL21DE3 (MIC 8uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC27853 (MIC 8 uM), K. pneumoniae ATCC13883 (MIC 4 uM), S. enterica ATCC14028 (MIC 8 uM), Gram+ B. subtilis (MIC 10 uM), S. aureus ATCC25923 (MIC 4 uM), S. pyogenes ATCC19615 (MIC 4 uM), E. feacalis ATCC29212 (MIC 4 uM).Antimicrobial robustness: salt-insensitive: NaCl-insensitive:E. coli; NaCl-insensitive:P. aeruginosa; NaCl-insensitive:K. pneumoniae; NaCl-insensitive:S. enterica; NaCl-insensitive:B. subtilis;  NaCl-insensitive:S. aureus; NaCl-insensitive:S. pyogenes; NaCl-insensitive:E. feacalis. tested at 150 and 300 mM.Toxicity: dose-depedent hemolysis HC50 <50 uM. Provided by Arjun Nair.
Literature Information.Author: Mohanram H, Bhattacharjya S.2016
Literature Information.Title: Salt-Resistant Short Antimicrobial Peptides
